name: Dune Delta
description:
PRESS G TO LOAD THROUGH DOORS, THIS IS IMPORTANT FOR LEVEL SELECT!!!

Im sorry i forgot to put that there.

A small, almost mini-game like game made for Brackeys Game Jam 2022. It is a Sci-Fi game where you explore a lab inhabited with beans. You can learn a little bit about the beans while you're there and can explore the decent-sized facility. It was a pretty rushed game, made in about 19 hours with a lot of ideas not able to be finished in time. I really like the idea and hope it works well. Thanks, Brackeys for all the tutorials and getting me into game dev. Have a good one yall - Astra.
